ResourceHeader.Description: HF coherent radar at King Salmon, Alaska, a radar of Super Dual Auroral Radar Network (SuperDARN) operated by National Institute of Information and Communications Technology (NICT). In common mode, SuperDARN observes ionospheric plasma convection of the high- and mid-latitude regions with time resolution of 1-2 min. SuperDARN is used not only for the ionospheric research but also for the thermospheric and mesospheric research.
